0.cdata!:
Zaire - Deuxieme projet de relance de la
            culture du coton

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Cotton Rehabilitation Project
            is part of a long-term cotton rehabilitation program. It
            aims at increasing annual cotton production by about 30,000
            tons in the areas of three major cotton companies, which
            account for over 80 percent of Zaire's cotton
            production. It will help reduce imports of cotton lint and
            textiles. An additional objective will be to expand
            production of food crops grown in rotation with cotton.
